name: OR_CASE_DATES
description: The OR_CASE_DATES table contains OR management system case dates.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the date for the case.

columns.name: SURGERY_DATES
columns.description: The dates on which the surgery is scheduled to take place.
